Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class God

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.God
public class God
extends java.lang.Object
The class representing a god, chosen by the player by a set. The god's abilities allow the player's workers to modify their behavior or can apply as a malus to the other players.
